au.com.agic.apptesting.webdriver

Class GeckoDriverServiceEx

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openqa.selenium.remote.service.DriverService
      • org.openqa.selenium.firefox.GeckoDriverService
        • au.com.agic.apptesting.webdriver.GeckoDriverServiceEx

  • public class GeckoDriverServiceEx
extends org.openqa.selenium.firefox.GeckoDriverService
    An extension of org.openqa.selenium.firefox.GeckoDriverService fixed to deal with the bug https://github.com/mozilla/geckodriver/issues/158

    Manages the life and death of an GeckoDriver aka 'wires'.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeckoDriverServiceEx

        public GeckoDriverServiceEx(java.io.File executable,
                            int port,
                            com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<java.lang.String> args,
                            com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> environment)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        executable - The GeckoDriver executable.
        port - Which port to start the GeckoDriver on.
        args - The arguments to the launched server.
        environment - The environment for the launched server.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • Method Detail

      • createDefaultService

        public static GeckoDriverServiceEx createDefaultService()
        Configures and returns a new GeckoDriverServiceEx using the default configuration. In this configuration, the service will use the GeckoDriver executable identified by the GeckoDriverService.GECKO_DRIVER_EXE_PROPERTY system property. Each service created by this method will be configured to use a free port on the current system.
        Returns:
        A new GeckoDriverService using the default configuration.
